Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: A clearing in the woods, with a natural hot spring in the center. The clearing is warm due to the steam coming from the clear water in the hole in the ground. Sturdy boulders surround the hole so that it becomes a nice pool one could use to sit in and relax in if one was feeling so inclined. Around the hot springs the ground is barren save for a screen of tall reeds.
A clearing in the woods, with a natural hot spring in the center.
A winding path that goes to the top of the mountain.
A muddy path weaves between the trees, leading towards the camp.
Big round stones with flat tops good for sitting on
Long plants that stick straight out of the ground. They are tan and straight, providing nice privacy from the rest of the wolrd
A hole in the ground filled with clear water with steam seen floating near the surface. The center of the spring is dark blue, suggesting that it goes much deeper, whereas the edges are light blue.
A hole in the ground filled with clear water with steam seen floating near the surface.
